name: Nana's Last Gambit
description:
Nana's Last Gambit is a mix between a turn based dungeon crawler and the classical candy puzzle mobile games.

Game made for the Mix and Game Jam 2020.

GOAL:
Kill the enemies to turn their under tile into the color that ther are carrying. 
Chain same color tiles to make them explode and win some points.

PLOT
Granma finally managed to beat all the 1.546.595 levels of the classical game Candy Rush, except for five. 
The game developers can't keep up with granma's speed, they will have to use the secret weapon.

If she wants to complete the game, she will have to become the game.  

CONTROLS
WASD: Move
LClick: Shoot (You can only shoot once per round)
ScrollWheel: Zoom in and out
Tab: Show Controls
Esc: Return to main menu
R: Reload level

Music from:
https://pluslerin.itch.io/retro-rpg-bgms

Game made by
Pol Carrera Catalina(PolCarCat)
